Problem: The study addresses the influence of CuO content on the catalytic activity for CO oxidation in CuO-Ce0.6Zr0.4O₂ catalysts.
Method: Microwave heating decomposition is used to prepare CuO-Ce0.6Zr0.4O₂ catalysts with varying CuO content, which are then characterized and tested for CO oxidation performance.
Task: Catalytic activity evaluation for CO oxidation
